alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 4:27AM MST until October 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. The strongest winds are expected from 8 PM MST tonight through 8 AM MST Sunday morning. * WHERE...Western Mogollon Rim and adjacent Little Colorado River Valley, Black Mesa, and Chinle Valley. * WHEN...From noon today to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the wind, snow showers will develop over the mountains tonight into Sunday morning which may cause areas of blowing snow and poor visibility.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
